# nirvana_networking_vpc (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nirvana_networking_vpc" "example_networking_vpc" {
  name = "my-vpc"
  region = "us-sea-1"
  subnet_name = "my-subnet"
}
```

- `region` (String)

Import is supported using the following syntax:
